banner.title: The new frontier in eCommerce
banner.subtitle: Brand commerce tools that offer a consistent purchasing experience across all touchpoints, dealerships, online and offline channels.

take.title: Take back control of the customer journey
take.subtitle: Allow consumers to experience your brand as you intend. Optimize their conversion path wherever they go while nurturing customer loyalty.

globalBrand.title: IChiba OnePlatform brand commerce solution & its cores
globalBrand.subtitle: Ensure your customer experience your brand the way you want them to by taking full visibility from discovery to purchase and everything in between.

steamline.title: #1. Streamline management of your omnichannel selling

content.take: Take full control of the customer journey and optimize it by understanding consumer shopping behavior and offering full-cart visibility and insights.
content.make: Make all channels shoppable and centrally manage them on a single platform. Monitor a consolidated inventory, and unify order management with global visibility and control.
content.quick: Quickly and precisely manage product catalog across channels: Update the product catalog, campaign creatives, and content from a single source and enhance the purchasing experience for customers.

content.monitor: Monitor the brands to have a complete visibility of products, placements, pricing and promotions across all channels where your brand is sold.
content.keep: Keep an eye on all information on product detail pages and optimise your promotional dollars and search share.
content.track: Track and analyze various types of data to enhance digital shelf optimization.

orderFulfill.title: #3. Order fulfillment management at a single dashboard
orderFulfill.subtitle: #3. Order fulfillment management at a single dashboard

content.detailedly: Detailedly and strictly oversee eCommerce order fulfillment process from picking, packing and shipping on a 360Â° visibility platform.
content.get: Get your sellers' multiple marketplace/sales channel data, such as inventory and orders, synced directly with the warehouse processes.
content.align: Align warehouse, logistics operation and fulfillment process with multichannel selling to offer a smooth post-purchase experience.

content.connect: Connect your multi-channel selling with your third party enterprise systems such as accounting tools & SAP system for D2C.
content.integrate: Integrate your online channels in a few steps, and start to centrally manage everything in one place.

build.title: #5. Build business intelligence with real-time consolidated report daily

content.track: Track & measure your success with customizable reports for your inventory, orders, promotions, sales, and more.
content.access: Access real-time insights to understand business performance, capture time-sensitive opportunities, and make instant decisions on whether to adjust or double down on a strategy.

customized.title: #6. Customized customer journey & experience through multi-market

content.custom: Customize a region-specific domain simply by automatically creating subfolders.
content.gather: Gather information from omnichannel to explore what customers do along their journey, thereby using our tools to optimize it, and drive brand loyalty.

offer.title: Offer consumers a unified purchase experience across all channels
offer.subtitle: Get access to 100+ smart capabilities to administer eCommerce operations. Rotate inventory more quickly and without error, process orders as soon as they are received, conduct promotional offers & provide your customers with an exceptional post-purchase experience.

case.title: Deliver a holistic buying experience to your shoppers across channels...
